data.rationale:
XML::XMetaL is a framework for developing object oriented Corel
    XMetaL customization packages. XMetaL is an XML editor running under
    Windows.

    The approach used has several advantages over standard XMetaL
    development:

    * Object orientation, with all that entails from using
    abstractions, design patterns, and classes that can be reused by
    different customization packages * No global macros or variables,
    thus no collisions between incompatible customization packages *
    Possible to do automated unit and function testing
